content.raw:
Hi Hector,

Thank you for taking the time and providing more details. I was able to reproduce the`CommsClient`problem registering with broker so we’re looking into it right now. I’ll post back here an update.

In the meantime, can you try to run your 4 vehicles using docker-compose by editing the `docker-compose.yml`file . Notice that you need to add a bridge, a solution, and a relay for each of the vehicles.

Let me know if you have any questions.
content.html:
Hi Hector,

Thank you for taking the time and providing more details. I was able to reproduce theCommsClientproblem registering with broker so we’re looking into it right now. I’ll post back here an update.

In the meantime, can you try to run your 4 vehicles using docker-compose by editing the docker-compose.ymlfile . Notice that you need to add a bridge, a solution, and a relay for each of the vehicles.

Let me know if you have any questions.
